00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A dose scoring ausgab object for beampp: Allows the user to score dose in
00031 #  specified CMs on a region-by-region and/or medium-by-medium basis. Volumes
00032 #  of all regions are assumed to be 1 cm^3 unless explicitly specified by the
00033 #  user.
00034 #
00035 ###############################################################################
00036 */
00037 
00038

00049 #include "beampp_class.h"

00085 class BEAM_DOSE_SCORING_EXPORT BEAM_DoseScoring : public EGS_AusgabObject {
00086 
00087 public:
00088 
00089      BEAM_DoseScoring(const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f = 0);
00090 
00091      ~BEAM_DoseScoring();
00092 
00093      int processEvent(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) {
00094 
00095         int ir = app->top_p.ir, imed = ir>=0 ? app->getMedium(ir):-1;
00096         EGS_Float edep = app->getEdep();
00097 
00098         if (d_reg_index[ir]<0) return 0;
00099 
00100         /**** energy deposition in current region ***/
00101         if( iarg <= 4 && ir >= 0 && edep > 0 && dose) {
00102           dose->score(d_reg_index[ir], edep*app->top_p.wt);
00103         }
00104 
00105         /**** energy deposition in a medium ***/
00106         //put it here so it doesn't get scored if this is not a scoring region
00107         if( iarg <= 4 && imed >= 0 && edep > 0 && doseM ) {
00108           doseM->score(imed+nmedia*d_reg_cm_ind[ir], edep*app->top_p.wt);
00109         }
00110         return 0;
00111     };
00112 
00113     bool needsCall(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) const { return true; };
00114 
00115     void setApplication(EGS_Application *App);
00116 
00117     void reportResults();
00118 
00119     void setCurrentCase(EGS_I64 ncase) {
00120         if( ncase != m_lastCase ) {
00121             m_lastCase = ncase;
00122             if (dose)  dose->setHistory(ncase);
00123             if (doseM) doseM->setHistory(ncase);
00124         }
00125     };
00126     int getDigits(int i){
00127         int imax = 10;
00128         while(i>=imax){imax*=10;}
00129         return (int)log10((float)imax);
00130     };
00131 
00132     void setVol(const vector<EGS_Float> volin){vol_list=volin;};
00133     void setVol(const EGS_Float volin){vol_list.push_back(volin);};
00134     void setDoseCMs(const vector <int> dcm){d_cms=dcm;};
00135     void setMediumScoring(bool flag){score_medium_dose=flag;};
00136     void setRegionScoring(bool flag){score_region_dose=flag;};
00137 
00138     bool storeState(ostream &data) const;
00139     bool setState(istream &data);
00140     void resetCounter();
00141     bool addState(istream &data);
00142     int addTheStates(istream &data);
00143 
00144 protected:
00145   BEAMpp_Application* bapp;
00146   EGS_ScoringArray *dose;  
00147   EGS_ScoringArray *doseM;  
00148   vector <EGS_Float>  vol_list; // Input list of region volumes
00149   vector <int> d_cms;       // List of CMs for which dose is to be output
00150   vector <int> d_region;        // Input list of dose scoring regions  d_reg[i] = ir
00151   vector <int> d_reg_index;     // list index for dose scoring regions d_reg_index[ir]= 0..d_reg.size()-1
00152   vector <int> d_reg_cm_ind;    // dose CM index for each dose region.  Allows quick scoring of medium dose.
00153   vector < vector <int> > cm_med; // list of media present in CMs in which dose is scored
00154   vector <EGS_Float>  vol;      // geometrical region volumes
00155   int nreg,     // number of regions in the geometry
00156       nmedia;   // number of media in the input file
00157   int max_dreg, // maximum dose region number
00158       max_medl; // maximum medium name length
00159   EGS_I64    m_lastCase;   
00160   bool score_medium_dose,
00161        score_region_dose;
00162 };
